attributes.action: To look at making a law to stop trolls on social media
attributes.additional_details: Too many people have been trolled, hated and hurt. Getting trolled on social media it affects a persons mental well-being. Getting a ban or getting the comments removed quickly will help to prevent people’s mental health to go worse and helps people with their self esteem.
attributes.background: I would like the government to look at cases where people have been trolled on social media and put them on a ban or get the messages removed not long after being published.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.  We understand you're concerned about online abuse, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government to change. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
